projects.descriptionShort: A website adjusted to different screen sizes, coded from scratch (HTML, CSS and JS only).
projects.descriptionLong: The main focus of this project was responsive design. I used multiple media queries, grids, flexboxes and other functionalities to make the website comfortable to use on different screen sizes.

projects.descriptionShort: A huge project focused on creating multiple functionalities using JavaScript.
projects.descriptionLong: The goal of the project was to design a system for Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. The initial list of functionalities included filtering, sorting, expelling students and adding them to prefects list. Due to some radical changes in the school, each student needed a blood status which had to be concluded from separate set of data. It was later used to add 'pure-blood' students to the Inquisitorial Squad. The last task was to create a 'hack' function, break some functionalities and limit user's actions. More details are in the readme file on GitHub.

projects.descriptionShort: A basic calculator written in JS.
projects.descriptionLong: This is a calculator with basic mathematical operations and a horrible UI. The goal was to practise some basic JavaScript skills, how to get user's inputs and use them to get desired result.
